option.name: originalContent
option.value:
package app
import ( "techmind/internal/connetions/elasticsearch" "techmind/internal/connetions/minio" "techmind/internal/connetions/postgres" "techmind/internal/di"
"go.uber.org/fx" )
var App = fx.Options( fx.Provide( postgres.New, minio.New, elasticsearch.New, ), di.Repository, di.Service, di.Transport, )

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
package app
import ( "techmind/internal/connetions/elasticsearch" "techmind/internal/connetions/minio" "techmind/internal/connetions/postgres" "techmind/internal/di"
"go.uber.org/fx" )
var App = fx.Options( fx.Provide( postgres.New, minio.New, elasticsearch.New, ), di.Repository, di.Service, di.Transport, )

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
version: "3"
services: postgres: image: postgres:17.5 ports: - "5432:5432" environment: POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
minio: image: minio/minio:latest ports: - "9000:9000" - "9001:9001" environment: MINIO_ROOT_USER: minioadmin MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: minioadmin command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
elasticsearch: image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.0 ports: - "9200:9200" environment: - discovery.type=single-node - xpack.security.enabled=true - xpack.security.enrollment.enabled=true - ELASTIC_PASSWORD=changeme ulimits: memlock: soft: -1 hard: -1

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: "3"
services: postgres: image: postgres:17.5 ports: - "5432:5432" environment: POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
minio: image: minio/minio:latest ports: - "9000:9000" - "9001:9001" environment: MINIO_ROOT_USER: minioadmin MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: minioadmin command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
elasticsearch: image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.0 ports: - "9200:9200" environment: - discovery.type=single-node - xpack.security.enabled=true - xpack.security.enrollment.enabled=true - ELASTIC_PASSWORD=changeme ulimits: memlock: soft: -1 hard: -1
